gemini.description: Google's Gemini models - fast and cost-effective

claude.description: Anthropic's Claude models - excellent reasoning and detailed output

openai.description: OpenAI's GPT models - versatile and reliable

_cli_overrides: You can override provider/model from command line:
_workflow: 1. Set up this config file in your project root
2. Set environment variables for API keys (GEMINI_API_KEY, ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, OPENAI_API_KEY)
4. Review BRD, add feedback to docs/product/conversations/feedback/brd-feedback.md if needed
6. Review design spec, add feedback if needed
8. Review tickets, add feedback if needed
9. Rerun any script to regenerate with feedback incorporated
